name: Grovo
content:
Grovo was a rancor from Dathomir that lived during the Galactic Civil War.
Grovo appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Grovo and Axkva Min were added to the game with the "Publish 5" update, released on December 16, 2003. Grovo was removed from the game when Axkva Min was included in the eponymous "Heroic Encounter," upon the release of the "Chapter 7" on November 1, 2007. Grovo was in fact replaced by another rancor named Gorvo.
